description.value: As a Half Action, or when making a Charge Action, the character can declare they are making a Takedown Action against an opponent in melee. They roll to hit using any normal modifiers for weapons and Talents (including +20 for charging). If character hits, and would have done at least 1 Point of Damage after Armour/Toughness Reduction with their attack, they instead do no damage, and target makes +0 Toughness Test or is stunned for 1 Round and Knocked Prone. Additionally, character does not suffer -20 penalty to Weapon Skill when performing the Stun Action.
